actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individuals receiving State or local governmental pensions an exclusion equivalent to that received by social security recipients.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any amount received by an individual as a governmental pension under a State or local retirement system. Limits such amount to the applicable social security exclusion.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individuals receiving State or local governmental pensions an exclusion equivalent to that received by social security recipients.
